    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        public static long create(int root,
                          String name,
                          int sam,
                          long pool)
                   throws Error
        Create or open a Registry Key.
        参数:
        name - Registry Subkey to open
        root - Root key, one of HKEY_*
        sam - Access mask that specifies the access rights for the key.
        pool - Pool used for native memory allocation
        返回:
        Opened Registry key
        抛出:
        Error - An error occurred

      • open

        public static long open(int root,
                        String name,
                        int sam,
                        long pool)
                 throws Error
        Opens the specified Registry Key.
        参数:
        name - Registry Subkey to open
        root - Root key, one of HKEY_*
        sam - Access mask that specifies the access rights for the key.
        pool - Pool used for native memory allocation
        返回:
        Opened Registry key
        抛出:
        Error - An error occurred

      • close

        public static int close(long key)
        Close the specified Registry key.
        参数:
        key - The Registry key descriptor to close.
        返回:
        the operation status

      • getType

        public static int getType(long key,
                          String name)
        Get the Registry key type.
        参数:
        key - The Registry key descriptor to use.
        name - The name of the value to query
        返回:
        Value type or negative error value

      • getValueI

        public static int getValueI(long key,
                            String name)
                     throws Error
        Get the Registry value for REG_DWORD
        参数:
        key - The Registry key descriptor to use.
        name - The name of the value to query
        返回:
        Registry key value
        抛出:
        Error - An error occurred

      • getValueJ

        public static long getValueJ(long key,
                             String name)
                      throws Error
        Get the Registry value for REG_QWORD or REG_DWORD
        参数:
        key - The Registry key descriptor to use.
        name - The name of the value to query
        返回:
        Registry key value
        抛出:
        Error - An error occurred

      • getSize

        public static int getSize(long key,
                          String name)
        Get the Registry key length.
        参数:
        key - The Registry key descriptor to use.
        name - The name of the value to query
        返回:
        Value size or negative error value

      • setValueI

        public static int setValueI(long key,
                            String name,
                            int val)
        Set the Registry value for REG_DWORD
        参数:
        key - The Registry key descriptor to use.
        name - The name of the value to set
        val - The the value to set
        返回:
        If the function succeeds, the return value is 0

      • enumKeys

        public static String[] enumKeys(long key)
                         throws Error
        Enumerate the Registry subkeys
        参数:
        key - The Registry key descriptor to use.
        返回:
        Array of all subkey names
        抛出:
        Error - An error occurred

      • enumValues

        public static String[] enumValues(long key)
                           throws Error
        Enumerate the Registry values
        参数:
        key - The Registry key descriptor to use.
        返回:
        Array of all value names
        抛出:
        Error - An error occurred

      • deleteValue

        public static int deleteValue(long key,
                              String name)
        Delete the Registry value
        参数:
        key - The Registry key descriptor to use.
        name - The name of the value to delete
        返回:
        If the function succeeds, the return value is 0

      • deleteKey

        public static int deleteKey(int root,
                            String name,
                            boolean onlyIfEmpty)
        Delete the Registry subkey
        参数:
        root - Root key, one of HKEY_*
        name - Subkey to delete
        onlyIfEmpty - If true will not delete a key if it contains any subkeys or values
        返回:
        If the function succeeds, the return value is 0
